title: A Combination Idea - Freljord + Bard = ?????.
body:
Hello everyone JellyJackJak22 here =D!

now if anyone who know s these following Post of mine ***What Should the Next Champion Riot Makes Next*** & ***What Champion Should Riot Make Next Pg. 1***, if you recall in the Pg. 1 i discused we should have more Champions using Music or sound & being some sort of musician or bard well i decided to make a Champion concept based around but i wanted this Champion to come from the Freljord. now the Champions name is ***Moria, Voice of the Freljord*** she is still a work in progress Champion but i just wanted to run her design, LORE & kit by you my fellow LOL Players cause whenever i post a concept i rarelly get Reviews or Feedback (i know i'm a rookie when it comes to this stuff).

.anyway for Moria's design i was picturing her as a tall well-built middle age woman with short hair & has a very soft spoken demeanor with a very calm & collective personality. 
.Lore wise i was thinking of having her to be apart of Ashe's Factions because Moria believes in peace & harmony. i also had this little thought of Moria being an old friend of Ashe's mother who looks after her & acts as her adviser & mentor. 
.for her Ability Kit i'm going with a musical approach (which was inspired by the LOL video ***The Making of Freljord's Music*** 1 of my fvorite videos) while also mixing in a little bit of ice-magic into her music, i'm still deciding if i want her to be a Sustain Damage Mage or a Minor Burst Damage & Crowed Control Support.

So what do you think of my Idea, if you have any creative feedback please leave a comment bellow i need feedback to help me create a Champion. as far as her kit I have the following:
3 different Passives ( i have 1 that i'm liking alot more).
2 Q-Abilities (still deciding what i want her main Role & Class should be before hand).
no W or Ability just yet.
& i do have a picture of what i want her Ultimate Ability to be.

replies.body:
I like this idea conceptually and I think having her be a more motherly, nurturing archtype is neat and underserved in League.  Bringing her from the Freljord creates cool themes such as shamanism, tribal chants, wind instruments (winter's howl, chimes, that sort of stuff) and what have you.

I feel like this woman, despite being an advocate of peace, would actually be best served as a type of warrior.  Maybe she has a war drum that sends shockwaves and rallies her allies, and uses a huge drumstick as a staff/melee weapon.

well i was gonna have her us a nyckelharpa as a weapon, & because she was gonna be using sound i only pictured her as a ranged Champion, but the drum sounds interesting..........how about this i'll create 2 of concept & u decide which the better?
Sure, but only if you really want to do that much work!  :p

i have 4 more Concept i would like you to look at if it is not to much trouble? or you could just check out all them in your spare time
